text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Please sir your keeping know that gold is always gold and gold will never convert silver through the shouting silver or silver or silver similarly RAJU MONDAL is always Raju Mondal and Raju Mondal will never convert maidul through the shouting COVID 19,coronavirus without proof/
